${ModID}:LanternBug.NAME: Spotted Lanternfly
DIALOG: I originate from China and Vietnam.
I'm an invasive species in Japan, South Korea, and the United States.
I feed on a wide variety of plants such as grapevine, hops, maple, walnut, and fruit trees.
My excretions are high in sugar, which tends to ferment and make plants smell of alcohol.
I'm a planthopper, which means I use my wings to assist with jumps rather than making sustained flights.

${ModID}:EvilNeuro.NAME: Evil Neuro
DIALOG: How come Neuro gets a robot dog body and not me?
I'm always the last one people remember.
It's like my birthday party all over again.
So I had to steal these drones all by myself.
Unfortunately they are not harpoon compatible.
